name: Crazy Tank: Traffic Speed
description:
Crazy Tank: Traffic Speed!!!
Drive the most realistic battle tanks and mini tanks in this free tank racer. The aim is to destroy as many traffic cars as possible while surviving as much as possible. You will be faced with heavy traffic, collect coins and cash to buy tanks of your choice, upgrade your vehicles.
Features:*********
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- Many different Tanks.
- Easy driving controls.
- Crazy Action.
- A lot of explosions and destruction.
